name: Education Assistance Scheme
description: Provides scholarships for students from low-income families.
eligibility: Household income below $30,000 per year, must be a student.
benefits: Covers tuition fees, provides monthly stipend.
applicationProcess: Apply online through the government portal with income and student verification documents.

name: Healthcare Subsidy Program
description: Offers financial aid for medical expenses to underprivileged citizens.
eligibility: Income below $25,000 per year, must have a valid health ID.
benefits: 50% subsidy on hospital bills, free medications for certain conditions.
applicationProcess: Register at the nearest healthcare center with income proof.

name: Women Empowerment Fund
description: Supports women entrepreneurs with financial aid and training.
eligibility: Must be a woman above 18 years, involved in a business or startup.
benefits: Low-interest business loans, free business training workshops.
applicationProcess: Submit business details and personal ID via the government website.

name: Unemployment Assistance
description: Financial support for unemployed individuals seeking jobs.
eligibility: Must be unemployed for at least 3 months and actively seeking jobs.
benefits: Monthly stipend for up to 6 months.
applicationProcess: Apply through employment offices with previous job details.
